Package org.mitre.synthea.helpers

Class SimpleYML

java.lang.Object
org.mitre.synthea.helpers.SimpleYML
public class SimpleYML
extends java.lang.Object
Helper class to parse a YAML file into a (hopefully) useable map format. This is useful for arbitrary YAML which doesn't try to adhere to any schema. (If it does adhere to a schema, there are other methods to parse YAML to objects which should be preferred) Java doesn't have dynamic typing so this class exposes a "get" method which takes a path string, and walks the map to find the desired item.

    Create a new SimpleYML from the String contents from a file.

  • Method Details

    • get

      public java.lang.Object get​(java.lang.String path)
      Get the object at the given path from the YML. For example, given the following YML:
       foo:
    bar: 2
    baz: 4
    qux:
      corge: 9
      grault: -1
  plugh: 7
      calling get("foo.qux.grault") will return Integer(-1)
      Parameters:
      path - Path to desired object
      Returns:
      the object at path
